attackSkillOne.name: Starfall Healing
attackSkillOne.description: Turn energy into stars, dealing damage equal to 90% of Magical Attack to a single enemy, and the next healing skill is guaranteed to CRIT.

attackSkillTwo.name: Healing Starlight
attackSkillTwo.description: Heal an ally for 120% of Magical Attack, increasing the healing amount by 40% to an adjacent ally.

attackSkillThree.name: Starfall Impact
attackSkillThree.description: Deal damage to a single enemy equal to 50% of Magical Attack, then make a Star Wish, dealing damage at the same position in the next turn equal to 70% of Magical Attack, While also dealing Slash Damage around it equal to the caster's Magical Attack.

passiveOne.name: Star's Gift
passiveOne.description: After being Protected, heal the protector for 30% of own Magical Attack

passiveTwo.name: Star Aegis
passiveTwo.description: When HP is below 50%, all damage received is reduced by 15%

peakPerformance.name: Peak Performance
peakPerformance.active: Heal all allies for 100% of own Magical Attack
peakPerformance.passive: After each attack, heal an ally with the lowest HP for 55% of the damage dealt.
